<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A GC strategy for uncooperative targets.  This implements lowering for the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// llvm.gc&#42; intrinsics for targets that do not natively support them (which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// includes the C backend). Note that the code generated is not quite as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// efficient as algorithms which generate stack maps to identify roots.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// In order to support this particular transformation, all stack roots are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// coallocated in the stack. This allows a fully target-independent stack map</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// while introducing only minor runtime overhead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-builtingcs-cpp-/shadowstackgc"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-builtingcs-cpp-/shadowstackgc/#a8025e65721f637e779cc6f8fdaa7a0fc">ShadowStackGC</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcstrategy/#abc5b7efa0f9360dac6bbd35ab553cb0d">GCStrategy</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A GCStrategy which serves as an example for the usage of a statepoint based</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// lowering strategy.  This GCStrategy is intended to suitable as a default</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// implementation usable with any collector which can consume the standard</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// stackmap format generated by statepoints, uses the default addrespace to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// distinguish between gc managed and non-gc managed pointers, and has</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// reasonable relocation semantics.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-builtingcs-cpp-/statepointgc"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-builtingcs-cpp-/statepointgc/#ad783af64abf7eede187e42abfcbd4f22">StatepointGC</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcstrategy/#abc5b7efa0f9360dac6bbd35ab553cb0d">GCStrategy</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Method is only valid on pointer typed values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pointertype">PointerType</a> &#42;PT = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;PointerType&gt;</a>(Ty);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For the sake of this example GC, we arbitrarily pick addrspace(1) as our</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// GC managed heap.  We know that a pointer into this heap needs to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// updated and that no other pointer does.  Note that addrspace(1) is used</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// only as an example, it has no special meaning, and is not reserved for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// GC usage.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (1 == PT-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pointertype/#af8aeced5e71d2589fa3e9791043af5cb">getAddressSpace</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A GCStrategy for the CoreCLR Runtime. The strategy is similar to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Statepoint-example GC, but differs from it in certain aspects, such as:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 1) Base-pointers need not be explicitly tracked and reported for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    interior pointers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 2) Uses a different format for encoding stack-maps</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 3) Location of Safe-point polls: polls are only needed before loop-back</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    edges and before tail-calls (not needed at function-entry)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The above differences in behavior are to be implemented in upcoming</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// checkins.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-builtingcs-cpp-/coreclrgc"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-builtingcs-cpp-/coreclrgc/#ad855caa394ad8edf75f93cbd521dee22">CoreCLRGC</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcstrategy/#abc5b7efa0f9360dac6bbd35ab553cb0d">GCStrategy</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-builtingcs-cpp-/coreclrgc/#ad855caa394ad8edf75f93cbd521dee22"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-builtingcs-cpp-/coreclrgc/#ad855caa394ad8edf75f93cbd521dee22">CoreCLRGC</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcstrategy/#a6d4b88865bc96bd6a93c3076e210af61">UseStatepoints</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcstrategy/#a32c75ebeabf283b9a98b1b5641a2885e">UseRS4GC</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// These options are all gc.root specific, we specify them so that the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// gc.root lowering code doesn&#39;t run.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcstrategy/#a876df2ee9b43a6e37c7e25cdbc5ee458">NeededSafePoints</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcstrategy/#a5d53780e41b87b0b8cb0e4a822f38281">UsesMetadata</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-builtingcs-cpp-/coreclrgc/#a7b5844a0f3f8ef4d67cd6603f7ab3e49"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::optional&lt;bool&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-builtingcs-cpp-/coreclrgc/#a7b5844a0f3f8ef4d67cd6603f7ab3e49">isGCManagedPointer</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;Ty)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const override </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Method is only valid on pointer typed values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pointertype">PointerType</a> &#42;PT = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;PointerType&gt;</a>(Ty);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We pick addrspace(1) as our GC managed heap.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (1 == PT-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pointertype/#af8aeced5e71d2589fa3e9791043af5cb">getAddressSpace</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end anonymous namespace</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Register all the above so that they can be found at runtime.  Note that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// these static initializers are important since the registration list is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// constructed from their storage.</span></CodeLine>
